creator: Paladin Studios
descriptionHtml:
Immerse yourself in the rich world of Stormbound, as four kingdoms struggle for dominance. Construct a deck of unique and powerful cards and then dive into real-time battles against other players.

Novel gameplay combines your favorite aspects of collectible card games with the tactical strategy of board games. Play cards from your hand to the game board and then watch your units march on the enemy base.

FEATURES:
*Tactical gameplay that rewards the most clever strategists
*Real-time PVP battles against players all around the globe
*Dozens of powerful cards to collect and upgrade!
*Incredible 2D and 3D art immerses you in the world of Stormbound
*Four distinct kingdoms with unique advantages and playstyles


Please Note: Stormbound: Kingdom Wars is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
descriptionShort: Tactical gameplay, card collection, and gorgeous art combine in Stormbound!

title:
Stormbound: Kingdom Wars
1.10.51.3746

creator: Stormbound Games
descriptionHtml:
Stormbound: Chess & Decks - Where deck building for Collectible Cards and Board Games collide in unique Turn-based Tactical battles.

Embark on an epic journey in Stormbound, where the clash of four kingdoms unfolds in a strategic battle for dominance. Craft and build a powerful deck, engage in real-time battles against players worldwide!

Ultimate Card Battle: Watch Your Deck Shine
Dive into the thrill of collecting dozens of cards to craft your powerful deck! Experience the magic as each card transforms the chess board into the battle on a battlefield! Strategically play your cards to outsmart your opponent in this chess inspired battle of wits.

Dominate the board
Discover the powers of four mighty kingdoms, each with its own cool advantages and playstyles. Uncover the strengths that set them apart, and shape your effective strategy accordingly to dominate the board. Focus your mind on building a chess board to play with your friends.

Real-time Chess like Battles
Battle players across the globe in electrifying head-to-head battles on the chess board! Forge your path to victory through various challenges awaiting you on the game board. Unlock a bounty of valuable resources to enhance your card and deck collection. Master your deck building skills to conquer the chess and cards ladder.

Customize your profile
Unleash your emotions with fun and personalized emotes that let you truly express yourself in the heat of the battle. Spice up your customized profile by choosing a cool avatar from our diverse collection, making your account uniquely yours.

Battle your way to the top league
Battle for seasonal ranking and great rewards, try your best in confronting diverse challenges across various battle game modes. Upgrade your cards, master your deck building skills and chess tactics to conquer the battle and get to the top league.

Seasonal Events
Enjoy seasonal battle events and unlock special rewards, enriching your collection of cards, decks and resources. Use your collection of cards to build strategic decks tailored for seasonal battles. Claim victory in challenging battles where the worlds of chess and cards collide in tactical gameplay!


Key Features:
- Deck Building: Build and enhance your deck with a diverse collection of cards.
- Strategic Gameplay: Challenge your mind with strategic deck building and tactical battles to maximize your rewards.
- Global PvP Duels: Engage in real-time battles against players worldwide.
- Visually Stunning Art: Experience the vibrant world of Stormbound through captivating 2D and 3D artwork.
- Four Unique Kingdoms: Explore distinct kingdoms, each offering unique advantages and playstyles.

Please Note: Stormbound: Chess & Decks is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
descriptionShort: Collect Cards, build decks, face enemies in real-time battles on a Chess board

Ultimate Card Battle: Watch Your Deck Shine
Dive into the thrill of collecting dozens of cards to craft your powerful deck! Experience the magic as each card transforms the board into the battle on a battlefield! Strategically play your cards to outsmart your opponent in this tactical PVP battle.

Dominate the board
Discover the powers of four mighty kingdoms, each with its own cool advantages and playstyles. Uncover the strengths that set them apart, and shape your effective strategy accordingly to dominate the board.


Real-time PVP Card Battle
Battle players across the globe in electrifying head-to-head PVP battles! Forge your path to victory through various challenges awaiting you on the game board. Unlock a bounty of valuable resources to enhance your card and deck collection. Master your deck building skills to conquer the card battle ladder.

Customize your profile
Unleash your emotions with fun and personalized emotes that let you truly express yourself in the heat of the PVP battle. Spice up your customized profile by choosing a cool avatar from our diverse collection, making your account uniquely yours.

Battle your way to the top league
Battle for seasonal ranking and great rewards, try your best in confronting diverse challenges across various card battle game modes. Upgrade your cards, master your deck building skills and tactics to conquer the battle and get to the top league.

Seasonal Events
Enjoy seasonal battle events and unlock special rewards, enriching your collection of cards, decks and resources. Use your collection of cards to build strategic decks tailored for seasonal battles. Claim victory in challenging battles where the worlds of strategy and collectible cards collide in tactical gameplay!
descriptionShort: Collect Cards, build decks and face enemies in real-time PVP battles!

Embark on an epic journey in Stormbound, where the clash of four kingdoms unfolds in a strategic battle for dominance. Craft and build a powerful deck, engage in real-time PVP card battles against players worldwide!

Ultimate Card Battle: Watch Your Deck Shine
Dive into the thrill of collecting dozens of cards to craft your powerful deck! Experience the magic as each card transforms the board into the battle on a battlefield! Strategically play your cards to outsmart your opponent in this tactical PVP battle.

Dominate the board
Discover the powers of four mighty kingdoms, each with its own cool advantages and playstyles. Uncover the strengths that set them apart, and shape your effective strategy accordingly to dominate the board.


Real-time PVP Card Battle
Battle players across the globe in electrifying head-to-head PVP battles! Forge your path to victory through various challenges awaiting you on the game board. Unlock a bounty of valuable resources to enhance your card and deck collection. Master your deck building skills to conquer the card battle ladder.

Customize your profile
Unleash your emotions with fun and personalized emotes that let you truly express yourself in the heat of the PVP battle. Spice up your customized profile by choosing a cool avatar from our diverse collection, making your account uniquely yours.

Battle your way to the top league
Battle for seasonal ranking and great rewards, try your best in confronting diverse challenges across various card battle game modes. Upgrade your cards, master your deck building skills and tactics to conquer the battle and get to the top league.

Seasonal Events
Enjoy seasonal battle events and unlock special rewards, enriching your collection of cards, decks and resources. Use your collection of cards to build strategic decks tailored for seasonal battles. Claim victory in challenging battles where the worlds of strategy and collectible cards collide in tactical gameplay!

Terms of Service: https://stormboundgames.com/terms
descriptionShort: Collect Cards, build decks and face enemies in real-time PVP battles!
